question: How long does it take to produce the T-shirts?
answer: Production usually takes around 3–5 weeks, depending on order volume and New Year holidays.

question: How will I know when my order is ready for pickup?
answer: As soon as the T-shirts arrive, SESC will notify you via social media and your batch groups. We’ll also update the 'Pick-up Points' section with all the details.

question: Is there any priority for T-shirt distribution?
answer: Yes, T-shirts will be given out on a first-come, first-served basis. So make sure to come early!

question: How can I check if my T-shirt is available for pickup?
answer: Before heading out, please check the availability tracker (by size) to save your time. Stock updates will be shown in real time.

question: What if I have a different issue or question?
answer: No worries! Just drop us an email at sesc.foc@sliit.lk and we’ll be happy to help.
